answers.answer: You're pregnant.  Having diabetes makes no difference to a pregnancy test as it's testing for a hormone specific to being pregnant.The fact that you have diabetes means that you have to be more careful.  You need to go and see your doctor about managing your pregnancy while you have diabetes.Occasionally there are other conditions that can secrete HcG to give you a positive pregnancy test which are quite serious.  So at any rate you need to see a doctor.

question: i have diabetes and i have not had a period for 4 months and every time i take a pregnancy test it says positive??? since i have diabetes can that mean that im not pregnant.....
title: AM I
